body:
Hey guys!

So I was just wondering what everyone's favourite Call Of Duty was? I managed to play through 2 of the games (Ghosts and AW) in 2 days XD. So yeah! Mine is probably Ghosts for singleplayer and AW for Multiplayer! :).

Please let me know what yours is so I can play it some time, thanks guys! :)
body_tagged:
Hey guys!

So I was just wondering what everyone's favourite Call Of Duty was? I managed to play through 2 of the games (Ghosts and AW) in 2 days XD. So yeah! Mine is probably Ghosts for singleplayer and AW for Multiplayer! :).

Please let me know what yours is so I can play it some time, thanks guys! :)
title: Favourite CoD?

replies.body:
I like MW3.
I play black ops 2 occasionally but the feels of the game is totally different than MW3 (multiplayer wise on PC)
replies.body_tagged:
I like MW3.
I play black ops 2 occasionally but the feels of the game is totally different than MW3 (multiplayer wise on PC)

replies.body: Everyone I know seems to say MW3! I like AW because of the Exo-suits.
replies.body_tagged: Everyone I know seems to say MW3! I like AW because of the Exo-suits.

replies.body: All have the same gameplay to be totally honest, but I use to play BO2 multiplayer a lot.that was fun.

replies.body: I have only brought AW myself but I probably prefer MW2. Those were the days...

replies.body:
Ive only played b02, but from the looks of it I like it Imo its the best.

EDIT: Note, I play on PS3

replies.body:
Modern Warfare 3 then Black Ops II.  Advanced Warfare is good, but it's suck a struggle to have good FPS since it is so graphic demanding.

Anyone up for some matches on MW3 PC?? :)

replies.body: BO2 and Modern Warefare 2. Those were unreal.
replies.body_tagged: BO2 and Modern Warefare 2. Those were unreal.

replies.body: The graphics on AW are AMAZING! The characters look so real, have you played/watched gameplay of 'Until Dawn'? The graphics on there are literally the best.
